channel.title: Vistex v7 remove damage soak
channel.description:
recently damage soak has been screwing me. why its annoying is because my server is pvp server,ok to the point, what it does is when you get hit with a massive hitlike 340,the soak would be 7,they would stay alive by 7 hitpoints.so everyone in server looks like they get extremely lucky but its just a bug that prevented them from dieing.i really hope someone understands what im trying to say
Look in screeny how i lived that hammer is like pring but i stayed alive due to damage soak as i drew my ghetto arrow showing you the connection
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/lightbox/home/Screenshots]https://www.dropbox.com/lightbox/home/Screenshots[/url]
